on reading compounds: 肉髯【ニクゼン】wattle (of a bird's neck)
kun reading compounds: 髭【ひげ】moustache, beard, whiskers, whiskers (on a cat, etc.), feelers (on an insect, etc.), (chin) tuft, extremely short pulse appearing on an electrical signal
髯発条【ひげぜんまい】balance spring, hairspring
青髯【あおひげ】use of blue eyebrow pencil to indicate a character has shaved his cheeks (in kabuki)
頬髭【ほおひげ】whiskers, sideburns, sideboards
